attributes.action: send peace-keepers from the U.K. (and may be the U.S.A. and Australia if they want to join in) to the W. Bank to help keep the peace between Fatah and Hammas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The U.K. should send peace-keepers, (backed up by American, Aussie and Polish forces if they want to join in to), to the West Bank to help keep the peace between the rioting Fatah and Hammas forces. We must stop the chaos spreading into Israel and the Lebanon.
